title: Spirit of God

tokens.lyric: Spirit of God in the clear running water,

lines.raw: [C]Spirit of God in the clear running water,

tokens.lyric: Blowing to greatness the trees on the hill.

lines.raw: [F]Blowing to greatness the trees on the hill.

tokens.lyric: Spirit of God in the finger of morning,

lines.raw: [C]Spirit of God in the finger of morning,

tokens.lyric: Fill the earth, bring it to birth, and blow, where you will.

lines.raw: [F]Fill the earth, bring it to birth, and blow, where you will.

tokens.lyric: Blow, blow, blow till I be,
But the breath of the Spirit blowing in me.

lines.raw: [C]But the breath of the Spirit blowing in me.

tokens.lyric: Down in the meadow the willows are moaning,

lines.raw: [C]Down in the meadow the willows are moaning,

tokens.lyric: Sheep in the pastureland cannot lie still.

lines.raw: [F]Sheep in the pastureland cannot lie still.

tokens.lyric: Spirit of God, creation is groaning,
I saw a scar on a year that lay dying,

lines.raw: [F]I saw a scar on a year that lay dying,

tokens.lyric: Heard the lament of the lone whippoorwill.

lines.raw: [C]Heard the lament of the lone whippoorwill.

tokens.lyric: Spirit of God, see that cloud crying,

lines.raw: [F]Spirit of God, see that cloud crying,

tokens.lyric: Spirit of God, every man's heart is lonely,

lines.raw: [C]Spirit of God, every man's heart is lonely,

tokens.lyric: Watching and waiting and hungry until,
Spirit of God, man longs that you only,

lines.raw: [C]Spirit of God, man longs that you only,
